original_text: The leaders of the priests and the important Jews spoke against Jesus. They said that he had done many bad things. Jesus did not answer them.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 장로들에게 고발을 당하되 아무 대답도 아니하시는지라

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests and the important Jews
They said that he had done many bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그가 많은 나쁜 일들을 했다고 말했습니다
